2.query_text: Philémon Yang biŋ cə́ŋtə́ ntútə́ púa mtiŋ myə ǎ bɔ dá'tə gaə́ dyə̂fa'

2.answer: ǎ bɔ dá'tə gaə́ dyə̂fa' ǎ bɔ dá'tə gaə́ dyə̂fa' ǎ bɔ dá'tə gaə́ dyə̂fa'

3.query_text: ɔmanpanin Akufo - Addo se , ɔbɛyɛ deɛ ɔbɛtumi biara de asi galamsey ano
3.reference_text: ansa na ne berɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no atwam ɔpɛpɔn , 2015

4.query_text: Amnyɔkuo no panyin , Nelson ɔhamisa , aka sɛ ɔbɛkɔ so ako ama
4.reference_text: nsesa aba ɔman no mu ɛmfa ho ne nnipa binom a wɔkye wɔn
4.answer: ɔbɛtumi akyerɛ wɔn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛtumi akyerɛ wɔn.

5.query_text: Kplékplé gbɛ̀tà gbɛ ɔ́ tɔn , sɔ́ azǎn mɔ̀ nyínkɔ́ tɔn ɖó é kplé xá Jeux Olimpique
5.reference_text: Modernes è blǒ ɖo azǎn 06ɔ́ lidòsùn xwè 1896ɔ́ tɔn è blǒ ɖo Athènes èe wú .
5.answer: ɖɔ́ ɖó é kplé xá 2008 nú Pékin .

7.query_text: Kwaba bantu babhubhileyo , amashumi amathandathu anesithandathu
7.answer: ababini ababhubhileyo , amashumi amabini anesithandathu ababhubhileyo .
